page.title: 07Graeme's House
page.content: My house is situated in Lindsay Drive, Wick. It stands on it's own in a private housing scheme with 4 other houses, and more being built. We have 2 living rooms, 3 bedrooms, 2 toilets and 1 utility room. There is a big garden, with a vegetable patch and a green house with tomatoe plants. My room and my sisters room has got built in cupboards to store our belongings. The kitchen is where we have our meals unless something is good on T.V., when we go into the small living room. I have a snooker table in the loft because it is floored. My house is a very modern one with electric central heating. The windows are double glazed to keep in the heat. We have one gas fire which warms up the living room.
